tool_description: For a caller ID, use the #1 API to identify names and view images. CallApp: Caller ID & Block is the phone lookup API with 100% success rate. Utilise it to retrieve identities, social media accounts, and further details on any phone number globally, if they are available.
name: CallApp
title: CallApp

api_list.name: Get Country Code
api_list.description: Get list of all country codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://callapp.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "callapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://callapp.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCountryCode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "callapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
